meanings.definition: Affected with nausea; inclined to vomit.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster made me feel nauseas.
meanings.sent2: The smell of rotten eggs was so nauseas.
meanings.sent3: The combination of pickles and ice cream was nauseas to some, but delicious to others.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the overflowing garbage can was nauseas to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the spoiled milk was so nauseas that it stayed with him for hours.

meanings.sent1: The strong odor from the dumpster was nauseas to passersby.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie had a nauseas effect on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The prankster's fake vomit was both nauseas and hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The news of the natural disaster was so nauseas that it left everyone in shock.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine was nauseas, but it was necessary for her health.
